mapper.select: select b.organizationId,b.bureauName,br.parentBureauId,br.isChild from bureauInfo b inner join bureauRelation br on br.bureauId = b.organizationId where br.parentBureauId = #{id}

select s.*,bl.bureauName as parentBureauName from bureauInfo bl inner join ( select b.organizationId, b.organizationCode, b.orgType, b.bureauName, br.parentBureauId from bureauInfo b inner join bureauRelation br on br.bureauId = b.organizationId where b.organizationId = #{bureauId}) s on s.parentBureauId = bl.organizationId
